name: Mind And Muscle Maniacs 8 Bit Special
name_original: Mind And Muscle Maniacs 8 Bit Special
description: A game made to run in DOSBOX on Windows, Linux, Mac, and consoles featuring the Mind and Muscle Maniacs.   A parody interactive fiction game with some edutainment features along with a story that follows the cast of the Mind and Muscle Maniacs YouTube channel.   Most importantly 8-Bit graphics as the title implies.
